You reach down and feel that your ass has grown in a similar way. Thoughts race through your mind as you try and work out what happened. In the end your thoughts land on the book you had read last night. You awkwardly walk over to the table, getting used to your new legs, and take a seat. You start flipping through the book looking for any explanation, until you find a section that might be useful.

In the instance of one predator eating another, unusual things may occur to their body. When this occurs, the predator will gain characteristics of the other. For example, a predator, further known as a, eats another predator, further know as b, because B has much larger breasts as A. Once B has been digested, A's breasts will grow to a similar size as B's. Sometimes, predators will use their power to give vore to others to gain some of their attributes.

"Wow, that's so cool," you say out loud, "I hope I get another chance to make these babies even bigger," you say, squeezing your breasts. You continue to skim through the book, but don't find anything else interesting at the moment. You stand back up and look around the room, hoping to find some clothes, but are out of luck. Instead you take your tattered clothes and wrap them around yourself and cover your privates. You give the room another quick search before deciding to...
141212211.title: New adult body.

choices: You take a nice, long nap.
1412122111.content: ... head out and look for some breakfast. After adjusting your clothes one last time, you head out the door. You follow the same path you took last night, this time on the hunt for something to fill your belly. Not long through your walk, you spot something out of the corner of your eye. On the edge of a small clearing, you spy a rabbit crewing on a small bush. You get up on your toes and sneak over, taking cover behind a nearby tree. You shift over to peak around the tree, but accidentally step on dry leaf. You stand completely still as the rabbit looks around, completely startled. After a few moment's, it cautiously returns to it's food. You take a few more seconds to get ready before pouncing at the rabbit. Even taking it by surprise, you are only able to just grab it. You quickly shove it's wriggling form into your mouth and take a large swallow. The bulge of the rabbit feels nice as it travels down your throat, before landing in your belly. You play with the small bump it makes in you stomach, jostling it back and forth. After a few moments you return to the cabin, and take a nap on the cot.
1412122111.title: Head out and look for some breakfast.

14121221111.content:
After about half an hour, you wake up to the sounds of someone knocking on the door. You get up, taking note that the rabbit is nothing but mush inside your stomach. You get to the door and open it to find your mother on the other side.

"Oh, um... Oh," she says, distracted by your minimal clothes, "I was, uh looking for my daughter, she ran away last night and I can't seem to find her."

"Shoot," you think to yourself, "she already found me, although I think she doesn't know it's me. Either way, I know just how to get rid of her."

"Hmm,I had a girl come in here last night, please," You motion towards the table, "take a seat while I go find her."

Your mother gives you a very gracious nod before taking her seat at the table. You pretend to look under the cot for a bit before standing up and sneaking behind her. Just before your mother looks behind her you pounce, taking her head into your mouth. She kicks and flails about, trying to escape, but you continue swallowing down her shoulders. You grab her arms and pin them to her sides as you begin eating her breasts, which are about a cup size smaller than yours. You stand back as your lips slide over her stomach, and lift her lower half into the air above your head. You swallow again, taking in her wide hips and her butt. Now with just her legs remaining, you easily slurp them down into your stomach.

Now with an extremely full belly, you take a seat and lean back against the table. You suddenly hear your mothers muffled cries from inside your stomach.

"Oh my God! What just happened!? Where am I!? Did you just eat me!?"

"Yep," You say, giving your belly a nice slap, "and soon, your going to be joining your daughter, too."

"D-did you eat her too!?" She asked.

"*Urp* Nah," you say, "I am her, and soon your gonna become part of me. Hehe," you giggle.

You mother continues trying to talk to you, but is drowned out by the sounds of digestion quickly surrounding her. You continue sitting there well past the point when she turns into a thick soup, occasionally burping up some excess air you swallowed. Once your belly had shrunk considerably, you returned to the cot to sleep off the rest of your ex mother.

You later wake up from your nap to find that you gained your mothers wide hips. You guess that she must have been able to eat people and never even known, considering that it is a passed down trait.

You continue living your life in the cabin, coming out every once in a while to hunt, or eating those who get too close to your home. Over the years you hone your skills, even discovering new techniques not even covered in the book. Using your skills, you extend your hunting range to the houses along the forest, and when those are abandoned, you extend even further. Rumors spread of a witch living in the woods that captures anyone that enters, and you make sure that it stands true. Now years after you first ran away, you flip through the pages of the book and reflect on how you got started. A smile crosses your face, and not long after, a rumble fills your gut.
14121221111.title: Mother Arrives.

choices: Go out and scavenge more food.
142.content:
You finally decide that one of your friends might be able to help you. You take a look around yourself and recognize the area as being near your friend Emma's house. You stand up and begin your trek towards salvation, at least, that's how it feels. After 10 minutes you find yourself at her front door. You consider knocking but don't want to risk Emma mom calling yours and snitching on you. Instead, you sneak around to the back of the house and tap on Emma's window. A moment later, it slides open and Emma sticks her head out.

"Julie? What are you doing out here?" she said.

"I ran away from home and I need a place to camp out for a bit, can you help me?"

"Yeah, come on in." Emma extends a hand through the window and helps you climb into her room.

"Thanks," you say, "This means a lot."

"No problem. Stay here for a bit while I get something for you to sleep on."

Just as she's about to leave the room, your tummy lets out a thunderous rumble.

"Do you think you can get me something to eat too?" you say. She nods before leaving and closing the door behind her.

A few minutes later she returns, carrying a sleeping bag, a couple of pillows, and a bag of chips.You help her lay out the sleeping bag before taking a seat on her bed and popping open the chips. You and Emma dig in, grabbing handfuls of chips in between conversation. The two of you quickly run out of chips, and you can't help but notice that you're still ravenously hungry.
142.title: Friendly refuge.

1421.content:
You send your hand back into the chip bag, hoping to fish out another handful of chips, but only find yourself grasping at air. You peek into the bag and see that it's completely empty. You place a hand on your stomach as it lets out a low grumble, telling you that you're still hungry. You look over to your friend and find your eye get caught on the glistening of the salt and oils on her fingers. You lick your lips and think about what they taste like. You lean over and grasp onto her wrist before leading it over to your mouth and placing one of her fingers inside.

"Ah! Julie, what are you doing?" Emma says.

You finish sucking the chip reside off her finger and let it fall out of your mouth. The combined taste of the salt and the taste of her skin sends your taste buds wild. With her taste in the back of your mind, you know what you're going to do.

"Don't worry Emma," you say, "I'm just having a taste. Did you know how good you taste?"

"You're starting to sound really weird, Julie," Emma said.

"C'mon, you really do taste good. And y'know, I'm really hungry right now. I could really use something tasty."

"J-Julie, are you okay?" Emma stuttered.

"I will be in a second." you say before sticking Emma's full hand into your mouth. She tries to pull her arm out but you hold it tight with both hands and continue to gulp it down. Once you've nearly reached her shoulder, she tries to shout for help, but you roughly shove your hand over her mouth, muffling her. After another swallow you widen your lips around her head and quickly send it down your throat. You wrap your arms around your former friend's body and lean back, dragging their struggling body straight up into the air. Using your arms to guide her, you let gravity drag her body down your throat. About halfway down, you feel your stomach straining against the confines of your shirt. After another swallow, your shirt rides up, relieving the growing pressure and releasing your growing stomach to the world. As you rapidly approach her kicking legs, you hold them still and slide them into your mouth. Now with only her feet lightly kicking outside your mouth, you place a finger on the bottom of her feet and push them in, closing your lips around your finger. With one last swallow, Emma is nothing but a meal for your large belly.

You look it over, rubbing the bulges Emma makes with her struggling. You belly gurgles and grumbles contently as it begins to work on it's meal. Suddenly you her some noises from outside of the room. You sit in semi-silence, your stomach still making it's noises, and wait.
1421.title: Emma is looking really tasty.

choices: Stay here until you finish digestion, then go out for some more food.
Claim the house as your new home.
14211.content:
The sounds from outside get closer and closer so you quickly lie down on Emma's bed and pull the covers over yourself. Just as you get settled you hear the door open.

"Emma?" her mother says, "Are you alright in here? I heard something weird."

You try and lie silently, but your stomach betrays you by letting out a loud *GLORP*.

"Emma?" she says, moving over to Emma's bed, "That didn't sound very good. Are you feeling alright?"

You curse your stomach as Emma's mom begins to remove the covers.

"Julie? Where's Emma? And w-what happened to your stomach?"

Hearing the sound of her mother, Emma suddenly shifts within you.

"Ah! It's moving!" She shouts.

"Sorry for this, but I can't let you tell anyone about me."

"For what?" She asks.

Giving her a silent answer, you grab her arms and pull them into your mouth.

"J-Julie? L-let me go!" she says, a terrified expression washing over her face.

*GULP*

You swallow, taking her hands into your throat.

"W-wait, Julie, please, I promise I won't tell anyone!"

You consider letting her go for a second, but the taste of her skin on your tongue changes that quickly.

*GULP*

With another swallow, her face is now directly in front of yours. Tears begin to stream down her face as her fate appears to be completely sealed. You open your mouth wide and swallow again, forcing her head to enter into your mouth. You swing your body around so that you are sitting off the bed and swallow again. You are easily able to swallow down the rest of her as she lets her body go limp, not even fighting her fate. You lie back down on the bed, not that you have a choice as the weight of your stomach is pinning you down. Your stomach gurgles loudly as it gets to work.
14211.title: "Oh Crap, it's Emma's mom."

info.brief_description: Some people just want to get somewhere, and they happen to be hungry.
info.description:
Welcome to the world of road trips! In this story you will take the role of one of our hungry women in their trips to wherever they wish to go.

Rules
1. No extreme gore.
2. No one sentence chapters.
3. Homosexual relationships are allowed and encouraged.
4. Try to keep the grammar somewhat reasonable. I will change anything I see as going too far.
5. No Character swaps. Don't kill off the main character and switch to someone else. End it there.
6. Use only second and third person.

Lore
1. Mostly women can vore.
2. Vore is not a common thing.
3. Any woman who can vore can give the power to others. This includes males.
4. Pretty much any type of vore is allowed. This includes oral, anal, breast, unbirth, ect.

That's about it. If I think I need to add something else, I will.

Thanks & have fun!
